name: get_the_current_stock_by_exchange_code_and_stock_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stocks.
Tool description: Get the the stocks informations using a REST API simple and free.
API description: Fetch the current stock data using the given exchange code and stock code from an API.

stockcode.description: The stock code of the desired stock.

exchangecode.description: The exchange code where the stock is listed.
